name: Bok Choy
benefits: Bok choy is a cruciferous green vegetable that provides antioxidants, fiber, and essential nutrients. As a cruciferous vegetable, it offers anti-inflammatory benefits and supports weight loss as part of a whole food, plant-based diet.
amount: As desired (typically 4 cups sliced in soups)

quotes: This soup is easily customizable to please your palate. 4 cups/400g thinly sliced bok choy, napa cabbage or other Asian greens. Add the bok choy, mushrooms, shallots, chillies and carrot. Lower the heat to low and cook for 5 minutes.
